name: smnb-workspace
description: Workspace root for SMNB (Next.js app in smnb/ and Convex functions)

scripts.build: cd mcp-server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd mcp-server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean:stats: cd smnb && npx convex run clearDatabase:getDatabaseStats
scripts.clean:analytics: cd smnb && npx convex run clearDatabase:clearSpecificTables '{"tables": ["post_stats", "pipeline_stats", "system_events", "rate_limits", "engagement_stats", "aggregate_stats"]}'
scripts.clean:largest: cd smnb && npx convex run clearDatabase:clearLargestTables
